p: There were 333 TCs that contained 46.6% of the G PT-naive cohort ( Table 1 and Tables A and B in S1 File). None of the socio-demographic or clinical factors were significantly associated with transmission of subtype G. Interestingly, a decreasing trend in the percentage of native Portuguese people included in TCs was observed since 2005 (p = 0.006, Fig 2A).
